Name: Cards and Castles 2
About the game: Cards and Castles 2 is the sequel to the hit tactical CCG Cards and Castles! Build a deck using two of seven epic factions - Druids, Vikings, Pirates, Crusaders, Warlocks, Ninjas, or the new Undead - then head into battle. Join a lobby with multiple games being played, spectate your friends, and chat; or, hop into our all-new, fully voice acted single player campaign! There are NO microtransactions or card packs - earn shards to collect every card just from logging in and playing in ANY game mode. Experience complex yet intuitive combat with alternating turns every round, over 10 unique unit classes, and tons of powerful spells!
